cookieConsent.title: About Cookie Usage
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, including basic functions such as saving your invitation code. By continuing to use this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.details: We only use essential functional cookies (such as invitation code association) and do not collect or share your personal information for advertising or tracking purposes. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings at any time.
